title: Teased
description: ***Note: This book is no longer available for purchase. Please refer to Captured by the Billionaire (The Complete Series) for this story. If you are interested in this title, please contact the author directly at juliasykes193@gmail.com***After a whirlwind seduction in Venice, Mallory Williams finds herself being taken to a fetish ball by none other than gorgeous billionaire Jake Cleary. She finds her initial resentment of the cocky little rich boy falling away as she gets to know the real Jake better, and she can't deny that she melts under his dominant touch. Mallory is learning to trust Jake, but can he let go of his difficult past and trust her in return?This is the third part of the Captured by the Billionaire series. Check out Part 1, Pursued, and Part 2, Captured. And look out for Part 4, Bound, coming soon!
author: Julia Sykes
